Activities.title: Start at South Lake Union Park
Activities.description: Meet up at South Lake Union Park. Rent scooters/bikes to start the city exploration.

Activities.title: Visit the Museum of History and Industry (MOHAI)
Activities.description: A short ride to MOHAI. Explore Seattle's history. (Please note, the museum visit will be from outside to keep most of the activities outdoor)

Activities.title: Head to The Center for Wooden Boats
Activities.description: Enjoy viewing various wooden boats and marine history at this outdoor exhibit.

Activities.title: Ride to Cherry Street Coffee
Activities.description: A leisurely ride to Cherry Street Coffee. Enjoy the views and the city vibes.

Activities.title: Monopoly at Cherry Street Coffee
Activities.description: Enjoy a game of Monopoly while sipping on some delightful coffee and light snacks.

Activities.title: Return to South Lake Union Park
Activities.description: Wind down with a leisurely ride back to the starting point at South Lake Union Park.
